title: Need firmware for Mac Pro
message: Have a Mac Pro 2008 that I need to install Mojave. Is there a solution to be compatible with Mojave? Firmware or some change?

title: Need firmware for Mac Pro
message: Pretty sure the solution is buy a new Mac... I don't think something that old will run past El Capitan..

title: Need firmware for Mac Pro
message: Possible, but some caveats. see here: [url]http://dosdude1.com/mojave/[/url]
